participant_1.background:
I rent an apartment to have more space for my sewing machine and gaming consoles.
i am going to start school at the university of kentucky.
i am currently single.
My dog loves spaghetti and meatballs as much as I do.
I am clumsy, but I make up for it with my cooking skills.

participant_2.background:
My dad is a chef and my sister is a server, so my favorite food is always on the table.
I'd brag about how I'm able to balance my business and my love of crafts.
i enjoy sleeping in on my days off.
i am well built and tall.
I loved listening to music with my dad.

content.text: Hi! I'm glad to meet you!
Same here! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! I'm excited to start school at the University of Kentucky.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun there. What are you studying?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about majoring in business or marketing.
Those are both great choices! I'm sure you'll do great in either one.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook, play video games, and spend time with my dog.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love cooking too. What's your favorite dish to make?
I love making spaghetti and meatballs. My dog loves it too!
That sounds delicious! I'm going to have to try that sometime.
You should! It's really easy to make.
I will! Thanks for the tip.
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
So, what are you looking forward to most about starting school?
I'm looking forward to meeting new people and learning new things. I'm also excited to get involved in some extracurricular activities.
That sounds great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
Me too!
